title: Kate Makes Chaps Chug Military Grog!
description:
On today's ZBT we've got 3 rounds in the magazine .. Round 1: Chaps lost a bet and now has to chug some GROG! Round 2: By now, you’ve probably seen that the bridge in Crimea was attacked. That bridge is remarkably important and we’ll get into why. It’s a scary situation that could and probably will impact us. Round 3: “Thank you for your service” is getting an upgrade WhistlePig Whiskey - Get your bottle at https://barstool.link/WPZBT or at a local retailer.
